short_summary: Elevator Remediation - Renovation for the AAFC Research and Development Facility in Lethbridge, AB
description: The AAFC facility requires a contractor to execute a project to do a full remediation of four (4) elevators, including removal and disposal of all parts to be replaced, electrical work, and mechanical work.
full_summary:
## Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) Elevator Remediation Tender

### Project Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the remediating of four (4) elevators at the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) office building in Lethbridge, Alberta.

#### Project Details

* **Project Title**: Elevator Remediation - Renovation
* **Location**: Lethbridge, Alberta
* **Scope of Work**: The successful bidder will be responsible for the design, construction, and installation of new elevator components, removal and disposal of old parts, as well as electrical and mechanical work to bring the elevators to functional standards.

#### Contract Information

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4614068010
* **Publication Date**: June 4, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 23, 2024, at 2:00 PM (Mountain Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 1, 2024

#### Contract Requirements

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:

* Alex Tikhonovitch
* Email: [alex.tikhonovitch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alex.tikhonovitch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not provided

#### Tender Documents
The tender documents can be viewed and downloaded from the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19899741?extsite=MTk4OTk3NDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
